alert.note: Alert for Brown (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 12:06AM EDT until May 20 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM EDT FOR NORTHERN MASON...ROBERTSON...SOUTHEASTERN BRACKEN AND SOUTHEASTERN BROWN COUNTIES... At 1206 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ripley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, Ripley, Aberdeen, Brooksville, Decatur, Dover, Germantown, Minerva, Abigail, Redoak, Moranburg, Stonewall, Parina, Santa Fe, Lowell, South Ripley, Chatham, Tuckahoe and Stoney Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
